TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SoapException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: 表示例外狀況，在經由 SOAP 呼叫 XML Web Service 方法而發生例外狀況時擲回。

span.span: Represents the exception that is thrown when an XML Web service method is called over SOAP and an exception occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能擲回的通用語言執行平台，或對 XML Web service 方法。The can either be thrown by the common language runtime or by an XML Web service method. Common language runtime 可能會擲回如果要求的回應的格式不正確。The common language runtime can throw a if a response to a request is not formatted correctly. XML Web service 方法可以產生藉由只擲回例外狀況內 XML Web service 方法。XML Web service methods can generate a by simply throwing an exception within the XML Web service method. 如果用戶端透過 SOAP 存取方法，是伺服器上攔截到例外狀況，並包裝在新的內。If the client accessed the method over SOAP, the exception is caught on the server and wrapped inside a new . 擲回具有下列屬性值：The thrown has the following property values: |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||原始的例外狀況屬性。The property of the original exception.| ||。.| ||XML Web service 方法的 URL。The URL of the XML Web service method.| ||`null`但空的明細項目存在於中錯誤項目。`null`, but an empty detail element is present in the fault element.| 對 XML Web service 方法可能會擲回時用戶端呼叫使用 SOAP。An XML Web service method might throw a when clients call using SOAP. 如果 XML Web 服務擲回，可以透過新增其他詳細資料，和屬性，否則無法設定 XML web service 方法，如果擲回的例外狀況的另一個類型。If an XML Web service throws the , other details can be added through the , and properties that cannot otherwise be set by an XML Web service method if another type of exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例會擲回設定 XML Web service 方法的其中屬性。The following example throws a where the XML Web service method sets the property.

param.name: innerException
param.span: 作為例外狀況根本原因的例外狀況。

span.span: An exception that is the root cause of the exception.

param.span: 這個參數會設定 屬性。

span.span: This parameter sets the property.

summary.span: 使用指定的例外狀況訊息、例外狀況代碼、識別造成例外狀況之程式碼片段的 URI、表示處理 SOAP 訊息之 XML Web 服務函式的 URI、與例外狀況關聯的人類語言、應用程式特定的例外狀況資訊、SOAP 錯誤的子代碼，以及例外狀況的根本原因參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified exception message, exception code, URI that identifies the piece of code that caused the exception, URI that represents the XML Web service's function in processing the SOAP message, the human language associated with the exception, the application-specific exception information, the subcode for the SOAP fault and reference to the root cause of the exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Actor { get; }
.property instance string Actor
Public ReadOnly Property Actor As String
public: property System::String ^ Actor { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.Actor : string

summary.span: 取得造成例外狀況的程式碼部分。

span.span: Gets the piece of code that caused the exception.

value.span: 造成例外狀況的程式碼片段。

span.span: The piece of code that caused the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性只能設定其中一個建構函式可接受使用引數。The property can only be set using one of the constructors that accepts an argument. 當提出 SOAP 要求時，會將訊息傳送至收件者，SOAP 動作項目屬性中指定。When a SOAP request is made, the message is sent to a recipient, which is specified in a SOAP actor attribute. XML Web service 內發生的例外狀況、 SOAP 動作項目屬性的值指派給屬性。If an exception occurs within an XML Web service, the value of the SOAP actor attribute is assigned to the property. 使用 ASP.NET 建立 XML Web service，XML Web service 方法的 URL 是 SOAP 動作項目屬性的值並傳回在屬性。For XML Web services created using ASP.NET, the URL to the XML Web service method is the value of the SOAP actor attribute and is returned in the property. 如需有關 SOAP 動作項目屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱在 SOAP 規格http://www.w3.org/TR/SOAP/。For more information on the SOAP actor attribute, see the SOAP specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/SOAP/. ## Examples 下列 Web Form 範例會呼叫`Math`XML Web service 方法，就會擲回例外狀況發生除數為零。The following Web Form example calls the `Math` XML Web service method, which throws an exception if a division by zero occurs. 擲回例外狀況時，Web Form 攔截到例外狀況，並將輸出例外狀況詳細資料，包括並屬性，到控制項。When the exception is thrown, the Web Form catches the exception and outputs the exception details, including the and properties, into an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SoapException.Actor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Actor Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SoapException.Actor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Actor Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 為了讓上述的 Web 表單，以使用下列`Math`Web 服務範例，命名空間的`MyMath`proxy 類別的建立期間指定。In order for the preceding Web Form to use the following `Math` Web Service example, a namespace of `MyMath` was specified during the creation of the proxy class.

summary.span: 指定 SOAP 錯誤碼，表示未正確格式化或未包含適當資訊的用戶端呼叫。

span.span: Specifies a SOAP fault code that represents a client call that is not formatted correctly or does not contain the appropriate information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 舉例來說，當可以產生，是當用戶端呼叫並沒有正確的驗證或付款資訊。An example of when a can be generated, is when a client call does not have proper authentication or payment information. 它通常是在用戶端呼叫必須是表示它就會重新傳送前變更。It is generally an indication that the client call must be changed before it is resent.

summary.span: 取得 SOAP 錯誤碼的類型。

span.span: Gets the type of SOAP fault code.

value.span: ，它指定發生的 SOAP 錯誤碼。

span.span: An that specifies the SOAP fault code that occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立的新執行個體時，可以只設定屬性類別。The property can only be set when creating a new instance of the class. 類別是透過 SOAP 呼叫 XML Web service 方法的 XML Web 服務用戶端使用。The class is for use by XML Web service clients that call XML Web service methods over SOAP. ASP.NET 會處理是否可呼叫的用戶端使用 SOAP。ASP.NET handles whether the client that calls uses SOAP. 這是 XML Web service 中的例外狀況發生時。This is when an exception occurs in an XML Web service. 如果用戶端使用 SOAP，ASP.NET 會包裝到特定的例外狀況，並設定和屬性。If the client uses SOAP, ASP.NET wraps the specific exception into a and sets the and properties. 可用的程式碼，稱為 SOAP 錯誤碼的 SOAP 通訊協定 1.1 版組如下所示：The set of available codes, known as SOAP Fault Codes for SOAP protocol version 1.1, are the following: |項目Item|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||找不到 SOAP 封套的命名空間無效。An invalid namespace for a SOAP envelope was found.| ||並非所有的 SOAP 項目需要進行處理。Not all SOAP elements require processing. 不過，如果 SOAP 項目會標示為`MustUnderstand`屬性值為 1，便需要此屬性。However, if a SOAP element is marked with the `MustUnderstand` attribute with a value of 1, it is required. 無法處理項目會產生這個例外狀況。Failure to process the element generates this exception.| ||用戶端呼叫格式不正確，或未包含適當的資訊。A client call was not formatted correctly or did not contain the appropriate information. 例如，在用戶端呼叫可能沒有正確的驗證或付款資訊。For example, the client call might not have the proper authentication or payment information. 它通常是表示此訊息必須變更之前就會重新傳送它。It is generally an indication that the message must be changed before it is resent.| ||在伺服器上，用戶端呼叫的處理期間發生錯誤不過，問題不在於訊息內容。An error occurred during the processing of a client call on the server, however, the problem is not due to the message contents. 比方說，上游伺服器不可能回應的要求，因為網路問題。For example, an upstream server might not respond to a request due to network problems. 通常，這種例外狀況，在用戶端呼叫可能成功更新版本。Typically, with this type of exception, the client call might succeed later. 如果 XML Web service 會擲回例外狀況，而非，並使用 SOAP 用戶端呼叫，ASP.NET 將轉換的例外狀況，將屬性設和擲回給用戶端。If an XML Web service throws an exception, other than and the client calls using SOAP, ASP.NET converts the exception to a , setting the property to and throws it back to the client.| ## Examples 下列 Web Form 範例會呼叫`Math`發生除數為零，會擲回例外狀況的 Web 服務方法。The following Web Form example calls the `Math` Web Service method, which throws an exception if a division by zero occurs. 一旦擲回例外狀況後，Web Form 攔截到例外狀況，並將輸出例外狀況詳細資料，包括並屬性控制項。Once the exception is thrown, the Web Form catches the exception and outputs the exception details, including the and properties into a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[classic soapexception.actor example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Actor Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[classic soapexception.actor example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Actor Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 為了讓上述的 Web 表單，以使用下列`Math`XML Web 服務範例、 命名空間的`MyMath`proxy 類別的建立期間指定。In order for the preceding Web Form to use the following `Math` XML Web service example, a namespace of `MyMath` was specified during the creation of the proxy class.

summary.span: 取得 ，表示應用程式特定的錯誤資訊明細。

span.span: Gets an that represents the application-specific error information details.

value.span: 應用程式特定的錯誤資訊。

span.span: The application-specific error information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以使用其中一個可接受的類別建構函式設定值。The property can be set using one of the class constructors that accepts a value. 屬性用來提供相關的應用程式特有的錯誤詳細資料`Body`SOAP 要求的項目。The property is used to supply application-specific error details related to the `Body` element of the SOAP request. 根據 SOAP 規格，因為無法處理用戶端要求，因為發生錯誤時`Body`的 SOAP 要求的項目屬性必須設定。According to the SOAP specification, if an error occurs because the client request cannot be processed due to the `Body` element of the SOAP request, the property must be set. 如果發生錯誤的 SOAP 要求的標頭項目中，您必須擲回，如此一來，SOAP 標頭中傳回的錯誤詳細資料。If an error occurs in the header entries of the SOAP request, you must throw a , so that the error details are returned in the SOAP header. 如果不會發生錯誤，因為處理`Body`項目，則不能設定屬性。If the error does not occur, due to the processing of the `Body` element, then the property must not be set. 中建置針對屬性，並的屬性可用來確保與 SOAP 規格的一致性。In building an for the property, the and properties of can be used to ensure consistency with the SOAP specification. 所有的詳細資料元素的直接子項目稱為詳細項目，而每個明細項目會編碼為獨立的項目內的明細項目。All immediate child elements of the detail element are called detail entries and each detail entry is encoded as an independent element within the detail element. ## Examples 下列範例會擲回、 設定 XML Web service 方法的其中屬性。The following example throws a , where the XML Web service method sets the property.

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the SOAP fault code is equivalent to the SOAP fault code regardless of the version of the SOAP protocol used.

returns.span: 如果 相當於 SOAP 錯誤碼則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 收件者可以使用這個方法來判斷是否屬性就功能上相當於`Client`SOAP 1.1 中定義，而不論使用的 SOAP 通訊協定版本的 SOAP 錯誤碼。Recipients of a can use this method to determine whether the property is functionally equivalent to the `Client` SOAP fault code defined in SOAP 1.1 regardless of the version of the SOAP protocol used. 版本的 soap 通訊協定 1.1 版可能會使用不同的名稱或命名空間，如稍後`Client`表示的 SOAP 1.1 版中定義的 SOAP 錯誤碼欄位。Versions of the SOAP protocol later than 1.1 might use different names or namespaces for the `Client` SOAP fault code defined in SOAP version 1.1, which is represented by the field. SOAP 1.2 命名錯誤碼`Sender`，表示欄位。SOAP 1.2 names the fault code `Sender`, which is represented by the field.

SOAP 1.2 命名的錯誤程式碼相同，不過範圍是由不同的 XML 命名空間，而且由欄位。SOAP 1.2 names the fault code the same; however it is scoped by a different XML namespace and is represented by the field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您的 Web 服務會使用多個的人類語言，會擲回例外狀況和訊息文字或其他已當地語系化為每個語言的內容。If your Web service works with multiple human languages, throw exceptions with message text or other properties localized to each language. 您可以使用這個屬性來識別與例外狀況相關聯的語言。Use this property to identify the language associated with the exception.

span.span: A SOAP Fault Code that represents a SOAP element marked with the attribute was not processed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 並非所有的 SOAP 項目需要由伺服器進行處理。Not all SOAP elements require processing by the server. 不過，如果 SOAP 項目會標示`MustUnderstand`屬性等於 1 或`true`，處理是必要。However, if a SOAP element is marked with the `MustUnderstand` attribute equal to 1 or `true`, processing is required. 無法處理項目會產生與。Failure to process the element generates a with a .

summary.span: 取得 URI，表示造成例外狀況的程式碼片段。

span.span: Gets a URI that represents the piece of code that caused the exception.

value.span: 造成例外狀況的程式碼片段。

span.span: The piece of code that caused the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 通訊協定 1.1 版用來與 XML Web service 通訊時，則會忽略屬性。The property is ignored when the SOAP protocol version 1.1 is used to communicate with an XML Web service. 使用 SOAP 1.2 時，屬性會設定`node`內的項目`fault`SOAP 訊息的項目。When SOAP 1.2 is used, the property sets the `node` element within a `fault` element of a SOAP message. 和這兩個屬性識別造成例外狀況的程式碼片段; 它們只是分別參考其 SOAP 1.1 和 SOAP 1.2 的名稱。The and properties both identify the piece of code that caused the exception; they just refer to their SOAP 1.1 and SOAP 1.2 names respectively. 因為它們都參考相同的屬性值，應用程式可以直接存取屬性。Because they both refer to the same property value, applications can just access the property. 這些屬性的值由建構函式接受設定`actor`參數。The value of these properties is set by the constructors that accept an `actor` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Role { get; }

summary.span: 取得 URI，表示處理 SOAP 訊息的 XML Web Service 的功能。

span.span: Gets a URI that represents the XML Web service's function in processing the SOAP message.

value.span: 擲回 之 XML Web Service 的角色。

span.span: The role of the XML Web service throwing the .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 通訊協定 1.1 版用來與 XML Web service 通訊時，則會忽略屬性。The property is ignored when the SOAP protocol version 1.1 is used to communicate with an XML Web service. 使用 SOAP 1.2 時，屬性會設定`role`內的項目`fault`SOAP 訊息的項目。When SOAP 1.2 is used, the property sets the `role` element within a `fault` element of a SOAP message.

summary.span: 指定表示在伺服器上處理用戶端呼叫期間發生之錯誤的 SOAP 錯誤碼，其中問題不在於訊息內容。

span.span: Specifies that a SOAP fault code that represents an error occurred during the processing of a client call on the server, where the problem is not due to the message contents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可能會發生，例如，如果所呼叫的伺服器無法回應要求，因為網路問題。A might occur, for example, if a server being called cannot respond to a request due to network problems. 通常，這種例外狀況，在用戶端呼叫可能成功更新版本。Typically, with this type of exception, the client call might succeed later. 如果 XML Web service 會擲回例外狀況，而非，且用戶端進行通訊與 XML Web 服務使用的 SOAP 通訊協定的情況下，ASP.NET 會傳回 SOAP 錯誤。If an XML Web service throws an exception, other than the , and the client is communicating with the XML Web service using the SOAP protocol, ASP.NET returns a SOAP fault. 在用戶端電腦上執行的.NET Framework 將轉換成該 SOAP 錯誤，將屬性設，該例外狀況擲回給用戶端。The .NET Framework running on the client machine converts that SOAP fault into a , setting the property to , and throws that exception to the client.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode SubCode { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode SubCode
Public ReadOnly Property SubCode As SoapFaultSubCode
public: property System::Web::Services::Protocols::SoapFaultSubCode ^ SubCode { System::Web::Services::Protocols::SoapFaultSubCode ^ get(); };
member this.SubCode : System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode

summary.span: 取得 SOAP 錯誤之 XML 項目中包含的選擇性錯誤資訊。

span.span: Gets the optional error information contained in the XML element of a SOAP fault.

value.span: A表示的內容SOAP 錯誤的 XML 項目。

span.span: A that represents the contents of the XML element of a SOAP fault.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 通訊協定 1.1 版用來與 XML Web service 通訊時，則會忽略屬性。The property is ignored when the SOAP protocol version 1.1 is used to communicate with an XML Web service. 所表示的內容屬性`code`項目會指定使用有限的數目的 SOAP 通訊協定所指定的預先定義的錯誤代碼，而時發生的錯誤類型的選擇性`subcode`項目可讓應用程式提供應用程式特定的使用者定義的錯誤代碼。The property that represents the contents of the `code` element specifies the type of error that occurred using a limited number of pre-defined error codes specified by the SOAP protocol, whereas the optional `subcode` element allows an application to provide user-defined error codes specific to the application. ASP.NET 會定義兩個這類程式碼，都由和欄位。ASP.NET defines two such codes that are represented by the and fields.

summary.span: SOAP 錯誤碼，表示在 SOAP 訊息處理期間，找到 SOAP 信封的無效命名空間。

span.span: A SOAP fault code that represents an invalid namespace for a SOAP envelope was found during the processing of the SOAP message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 封套是表示 SOAP 訊息的 XML 文件的最上層元素。A SOAP envelope is the top-level element of an XML document that represents a SOAP message.
